headline: PPL Gets Upgrade from Barclays on Improving Earnings Visibility
summary: PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) is included among the 13 Best March Dividend Stocks to Buy. On February 24, Barclays upgraded PPL Corporation (NYSE:PPL) to Overweight from Equal Weight. The firm also raised its price target to $40 from $37. The analyst said the company is well-positioned for a “constructive” outcome in its Pennsylvania rate case. He […]
